channel.title: Command help
channel.description:
how do you make it so you can only use a command once. like if i do ::torag and get the whole set. then if i try i again it wont work and sends a message saying something like "hey you already used that command!",
and how do you make it so a person cant keep using a command like ::Cash that gives u 30m, nd opens another client, uses the same command and transfers to his original?

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @solargreg5 solargreg5
item.description:
@solargreg5 wrote:

will it work on a 508 server?

and how do i make it so it wont let the person log in more then once?

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Like the FirstStarterRecieved thing in PI servers, you could use that.

It allows 2 starters per IP address.

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

solargreg5:

and how do you make it so a person cant keep using a command like ::Cash that gives u 30m, nd opens another client, uses the same command and transfers to his original?

You can’t. Unless, You could check that the IP of the two players trading aren’t the same or you could stop the same IP address logging into your server more then once.

Read full topic
